messages.subject: Santa Fe Symposium and this list
messages.msgSnippet: Because three of the moderators will be in Santa Fe later this week and through the weekend, some posts might not be approved as quickly as they might
messages.messageBody:
Because three of the moderators will be in Santa Fe later this week
and through the weekend, some posts might not be approved as quickly
as they might otherwise have been. If you're newish to the list and
you post and you don't see it come through, if it's in your outgoing
mail, don't re-post it please.

If you post something and responses are slow, it might also be because
some of the regulars are driving or in Santa Fe or are just elsewhere
recovering from the holidays. Please accept erratic list behavior for
the next week or so. Even though I'm not going to Santa Fe until
Wednesday morning, I feel like I'm packing up half the house, and
Holly's coming home from six weeks in England tonight, so I'm sure
I'll put a lot of energy toward hearing her stories and making her
some favorite foods.

Thanks!

Sandra
